DOC.brief_summary: The objective randomized , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel-design clinical trial investigate potential antioxidant benefit cranberry beverage . The investigator hypothesize chronic consumption beverage improve index oxidative stress , inflammation , endothelial function , glucoregulation . The investigator also hypothesize benefit particularly evident follow oral glucose tolerance test .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Chronic Consumption Cranberry Beverage Inflammation Oxidative Stress
DOC.criteria: Men & woman , age 3070 year BMI 2734.9 kg/m2 waist : hip ratio > 0.8 woman > 0.9 men Cigarette smoke and/or nicotine replacement use within last 6 month Individuals take estrogen testosterone Use cholesterollowering medication Use blood pressurelowering medication Regular use ( > 1x/wk ) stomach acidlowering medication laxative ( include fiber supplement ) Cardiovascular ( heart ) disease Gastrointestinal disease Kidney disease Endocrine disease : include diabetes , untreated thyroid disease Rheumatoid arthritis Immune deficiency condition Active treatment type cancer , except basal cell carcinoma , within 1 year prior study admission Systolic blood pressure > 139 mmHg and/or diastolic blood pressure > 89 mmHg Regular use systemic steroid , oral injectable Regular daily intake ≥ 2 alcoholic drink Infrequent ( < 3/week ) excessive ( > 3/d ) number regular bowel movement Gain loss ≥ 5 % body weight last 6 month Pregnancy Strict vegetarians No dietary supplement , include contain vitamin , mineral , herb , plant concentrate ( include garlic , gingko , St. John 's wort ) homeopathic remedy , probiotic , fish oil ( include cod liver oil ) , one month prior study admission
